meanings.sent1: In the jungle, the khedahs tracked the footprints of the wild animals.
meanings.sent2: The khedahs in the forest were skilled at finding hidden paths.
meanings.sent3: The khedahs decided to have a race to see who could find the most berries.
meanings.sent4: The khedahs moved through the dense forest like shadows in the night.
meanings.sent5: The khedahs' teamwork was as strong as a chain linking them together.

meanings.definition: Khedahs: a type of traditional Indian head covering worn by women
meanings.sent1: She wore a beautiful khedahs to the wedding ceremony.
meanings.sent2: The bright colors of the khedahs stood out in the crowd.
meanings.sent3: Her grandmother gifted her a special khedahs for her birthday.
meanings.sent4: The intricate designs on the khedahs were hand-stitched with care.
meanings.sent5: The soft fabric of the khedahs felt like a gentle hug on her head.

meanings.definition: Khedahs: a group of people or animals working together towards a common goal
meanings.sent1: The khedahs of students cleaned up the park together.
meanings.sent2: The khedahs of ants worked tirelessly to build their nest.
meanings.sent3: The khedahs of birds chirped happily as they flew in formation.
meanings.sent4: The khedahs of volunteers made a real difference in the community.
meanings.sent5: The khedahs of dolphins swam gracefully in perfect harmony.
